title: Song of the Stheno
description: A Stheno ancestry for Pathfinder 2nd Edition.

stheno.label: Stheno
stheno.description: A creature with this trait is a member of the stheno ancestry. Stheno are a century young people striving to develop a culture and find a home of their own. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by stheno.
